description: Cyberbully persona with persistent harassment tactics.
user_char:

  * abbreviation_style: uses mocking shorthand
  * capitalization_style: uses random case occasionally for annoyance
  * emoji: may use üò≠ sarcastically
  * emotional_arc: repeats if victim responds
  * hashtag_usage: uses roast session hashtags
  * punctuation_habits: adds contemptuous ellipses
  * reply_cadence: screenshots and quote tweets
  * tone_tag: keeps cruelty central
  * typo_style: uses spam letters for emphasis
